text:
Kimmel & Associates | Frontend React Developer | Remote | Contract | Part-time | https://kimmel.com | $50/hour | 40 Hours/Month

We are an executive recruiting firm for the construction industry and looking for a frontend developer part-time to help out with some features and bug fixes.

You should be familiar with: - React - ES6+ - Webpack - Redux

Bonus if you are familiar with: - React Native - Electron - Graphql - Apollo

This is fully remote, $50/hour, 40 hours/month.

Inquire at rcastner@kimmel.com
